General.Name: Wetown Electric Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wetown Electric Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of electrical products in China and internationally. It offers high and low voltage busbars; high and low voltage complete sets of electrical equipment; intelligent electrical equipment; power supply equipment and accessories; transformers; electrical components; photovoltaic ribbons; embedded channels; subway tunnels and evacuation platforms; and supports and hangers. The company engages in the research, development, processing, manufacturing, sales, and technical consultation and technical services of wire bridges; power transmission; distribution and control equipment; research, development, processing, manufacturing, and sales services of non-ferrous metals and by-products; engineering and technology research and test development; and energy storage technical services. Wetown Electric Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Yangzhong, China.
General.Address: Xinba Science and Technology Park, Yangzhong, China, 212212
